dimension:
22 3/4 x 6 3/16 in. (57.79 x 15.72 cm) (without fringe or ties)
16 3/4 in. (42.55 cm) (object part, fringe length)
title: Pipe bag
description: long rectangular bag with long fringe on one end; pair of fringed ties on one side beaded with alternating rows of green and pink beads at ends in triangular formation; large beaded rectangles on each side of bag--star-like shape in blue, red and white beads on green ground on one side--pair of white step-edged triangles with tiny red triangles and pair of blue triangles with black-edged pink T-shapes in center on other side
creditline: Gift of funds from Kaywin Feldman in honor of Bob Ulrich
